channel.title: [Delta] Climbing down ladder? [Delta]
channel.description:
I tried to make this code so I can climb down the ladder to get to hillies:
case 1754: heightLevel = 1; sM("You climb down the ladder."); break;
(used quote tags to make it easier to read) This is what I get in my run.bat when I click the ladder:
[client-1-Owner raver]: serverobjs size 0 [client-1-Owner raver]: atObject: 3116,3452 objectID: 1754
Then, ingame, nothing happens... Can someone help?

item.title: [Delta] Climbing down ladder? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Yeah. Get the coordinates for the area you want the ladder to lead, then handle it. It MIGHT be object click 2, not 1 (for some reason it just is with some objects. For example, Varrock dummies don’t handle object click 1, only 2.). By handle it I mean send your message and teleport the player to the area.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Climbing down ladder? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

King Lingerz:

If it doesn’t even give the message then presumably you’re doing something wrong. Also, underground isn’t a height level, it’s a completely different area all together.

Got any clue how to do it? :S

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Climbing down ladder? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

`Rich:

Are you already on height level 1…?

Think I was. Changed to heightlevel 2, still doesn’t work, it doesn’t even give the message.

Read full topic
